Distribution. India : Andhra Pradesh , Chhattisgarh , Goa, Gujarat , Karnataka , Kerala , Madhya Pradesh , Maharashtra , Odisha , Punjab, Rajasthan , Tamil Nadu , Telangana, Uttarakhand , Uttar Pradesh , West Bengal . Elsewhere : Australia ; China (including Hong Kong ); Indonesia ; Japan ; Malaysia ; Mariana Islands ; Myanmar ; Papua New Guinea ; Palau ; Pakistan ; Philippines ; Sri Lanka ; Vietnam .
